_label: Album of Daoist and Buddhist Themes: Kings of Hells: Leaf 39

identified_by.content: Album of Daoist and Buddhist Themes: Kings of Hells: Leaf 39

referred_to_by.content: Wang Hui 王翬 [1632–1717]; Li Jiale 李嘉樂 [jinshi of 1863]; Zhu Hang 朱沆 [active 19th century]; Dr. F. R. (Fredrik Robert) Martin [1868–1933], Stockholm, Sweden, and Munich, Germany (1910-?); Mrs. L. M. Morris [20th century], England (1947); (Sotheby's, London, sale, 25 March 1947, lot 118, sold to Stephen Junkunc III) (1947); István “Stephen" Junkunc III [1904-1978], by descent to his son Stephen Junkunc IV (1947-78); (Stephen Junkunc IV [b. 1937], Miami, FL, sold to the Cleveland Museum of Art) (1978-2004); The Cleveland Museum of Art,  Cleveland, OH (2004-)
